name: Aloe Vera
cat_tox_desc: Vomiting, diarrhoea, lethargy, depression, anorexia, tremors, change in urine colour
dog_tox_desc: Vomiting, diarrhoea, lethargy, depression, anorexia, tremors, change in urine colour

name: Asparagus Fern
water_desc:
Water plant every two days keeping top two inches of soil moist.
Mist daily.

name: Baby Rubber Plant
light: Partial Shade and medium indirectd light
cat_tox_desc: Nausea, vomiting, depression, lack of coordination
dog_tox_desc: Nausea, vomiting, depression, lack of coordination

name: Boston Fern
water_desc:
Water every three days.
Mist every other day.

name: Easter Lily
cat_tox_desc: Vomiting, inappetence, lethargy, kidney failure, and death is possible.
dog_tox_desc: Vomiting, diarrhoea, lethargy, depression, anorexia, tremors, change in urine colour

name: Fiddle Leaf Fig
water_desc:
light water once a week, keeping no more than the top 1/4 inch moist.
Reduce watering in Winter. 
Mist leaves every two weeks.
light:
Bright Indirect Light. 
Full morning sun.
cat_tox_desc: Oral irritation, excessive drooling, and vomiting.
dog_tox_desc: Oral irritation, excessive drooling, and vomiting.

name: Golden Pothos
cat_tox_desc: Oral irritation, intense burning and irritation of mouth, tongue and lips, excessive drooling, vomiting, difficulty swallowing.
dog_tox_desc: Oral irritation, intense burning and irritation of mouth, tongue and lips, excessive drooling, vomiting, difficulty swallowing.

name: Jade Plant
water_desc:
Summer - water deeply once every 7-14 days. Soil should be completely dry between waterings. 
Winter - water once per month or less during dormancy.

name: Maidenhair Fern
water_desc: Water once every two days or lightly, daily.

name: Parlor Palm
water_desc: Water once every 7 days. Soil should be dry between waterings.

name: Peace Lily
water_desc: Water every 3 days keeping soil moist but not overly wet.

name: Pothos
water_desc: Water once every 7 days. Soil should be dry between waterings.
cat_tox_desc: Vomiting, oral irritation and difficulty swallowing
dog_tox_desc: Vomiting, oral irritation and difficulty swallowing

name: Rubber Plant
water_desc:
Summer - water every three days
Winter - water once per week
cat_tox_desc: Contact dermatitis from sap, nausea and vomiting from consumption
dog_tox_desc: Contact dermatitis from sap, nausea and vomiting from consumption

name: Snake Plant
water_desc: Water every 7-10 days. Soil should be dry between waterings.

name: Monstera
water_desc:
Water once every 5 days. Keep top two inches of soil moist.
Mist every day.
cat_tox_desc: Oral irritation, intense burning and irritation of mouth, tongue and lips, excessive drooling, vomiting, difficulty swallowing.
dog_tox_desc: Oral irritation, intense burning and irritation of mouth, tongue and lips, excessive drooling, vomiting, difficulty swallowing.

name: Umbrella Tree
water_desc: Water once every 7 days. Soil should be dry between waterings.
